messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] naked was Re: censorship
messages.msgSnippet: My oldest is 11, fully formed, and still naked...but we ll see in the teen years.  My dad, bless his little 70 yo hiney, conservatively puts on his thong
messages.messageBody:
My oldest is 11, fully formed, and still naked...but
we'll see in the teen years. My dad, bless his little
70 yo hiney, "conservatively" puts on his thong bikini
underpants when he's at my house....I think mine will
be naked forever :)
Dana
--- Jane Van Benthusen <jane@...> wrote:
> > Our children decided for themselves when they
> were uncomfortable with
> > nakedness. The age that happened ran from about
> 4 to 7, depending on the
> > kid.
>
> My youngest is naked and making balloon animals
> while watching TV in the
> livingroom right now. He's 12! My oldest stopped
> around 7 or so. It's funny
> how different they are. Have any of you, that are
> naked friendly families,
> had a kid just keep going naked at home on through
> their teens years? Just
> curious, Jane :)
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Tia Leschke" <leschke@...>
> To: <AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, January 19, 2004 6:13 PM
> Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: censorship
>
>
> >
> > >
> > >Casual sex, as in having sex one night with one
> man, the next with
> > >another, and then another? I'm sorry, but I
> just find that wrong.I
> > >want my daughters to enjoy sex, not become
> sluts. And I don't think
> > >that people who are married should be having
> sex with someone other
> > >than their marraige partner.
> > >I am assuming here that I just did not explain
> what I meant by casual
> > >sex.
> >
> > I had a fair bit of casual sex in my life. Am I
> a slut?
> > I much prefer the commited relationship I'm in
> now, but I'm not sure I
> > would have known that if someone had been able
> to prevent my having
> casual
> > sex to compare it to.
> >
> > >I wear my panties and Bra. And they see people
> in bikinis at the
> > >beach, that is enough in my opinion. And (I am
> only assuming here) It
> > >would be rather difficult for a man to potty
> train a boy, if the boy
> > >didn't see him naked. And girls are shown to
> sit on toilets when they
> > >go. I used to shower/bathe with them when they
> were babies.
> >
> > Our children decided for themselves when they
> were uncomfortable with
> > nakedness. The age that happened ran from about

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] naked was Re: censorship
messages.msgSnippet: ... My youngest is naked and making balloon animals while watching TV in the livingroom right now. He s 12! My oldest stopped around 7 or so. It s funny how
messages.messageBody:
> Our children decided for themselves when they were uncomfortable with
> nakedness. The age that happened ran from about 4 to 7, depending on the
> kid.

My youngest is naked and making balloon animals while watching TV in the
livingroom right now. He's 12! My oldest stopped around 7 or so. It's funny
how different they are. Have any of you, that are naked friendly families,
had a kid just keep going naked at home on through their teens years? Just
curious, Jane :)


----- Original Message -----
From: "Tia Leschke" <leschke@...>
To: <AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, January 19, 2004 6:13 PM
Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: censorship


>
> >
> >Casual sex, as in having sex one night with one man, the next with
> >another, and then another? I'm sorry, but I just find that wrong.I
> >want my daughters to enjoy sex, not become sluts. And I don't think
> >that people who are married should be having sex with someone other
> >than their marraige partner.
> >I am assuming here that I just did not explain what I meant by casual
> >sex.
>
> I had a fair bit of casual sex in my life. Am I a slut?
> I much prefer the commited relationship I'm in now, but I'm not sure I
> would have known that if someone had been able to prevent my having
casual
> sex to compare it to.
>
> >I wear my panties and Bra. And they see people in bikinis at the
> >beach, that is enough in my opinion. And (I am only assuming here) It
> >would be rather difficult for a man to potty train a boy, if the boy
> >didn't see him naked. And girls are shown to sit on toilets when they
> >go. I used to shower/bathe with them when they were babies.
>
> Our children decided for themselves when they were uncomfortable with
> nakedness. The age that happened ran from about 4 to 7, depending on the
> kid. When they're uncomfortable with being seen naked, it's usually the
> time they no longer want to see their parents naked.
> Tia
